text.name: congrat
text.string: You've earned enough Food Bank points to\nunlock a new Feeding Frenzy screen saver!

text.name: congratAll
text.string: You've earned enough Food Bank points to unlock\nall the Feeding Frenzy screen savers! GREAT JOB!

text.name: helpText
text.string:
When you're done playing, you can try out your new screen saver!
 Open your 'Display' control panel and select the 'Screen Savers'
 tab. Choose 'Feeding Frenzy' from the list and click on 'Settings'
 to pick from the list of screen savers. Can you unlock all 6?
